nourish.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to give a person or other living thing the food and other substances they need in order to live, grow, and stay healthy
nourish.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The cream contains vitamin A to nourish the skin.
nourish.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to keep a feeling, idea, or belief strong or help it to grow stronger
nourish.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: We need to nourish our hopes and dreams.
